titleStmt.title: Bradshaw's ghost being a dialogue between the said ghost, and an apparition of the late King Charles : wherein are laid down severall transactions that did occur in the many passages of his life, never known before.
titleStmt.author: Bradshaw, William, 1571-1618.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Attributed to William Bradshaw by Wing.
